text: Ivandro Moura Cunha Lima (26 May 1930 - 28 May 2022) was a Brazilian lawyer and politician. He was born in João Pessoa, Paraíba, Brazil. He was a member of the Brazilian Senate from 1977 until 1982. Lima died on 28 May 2022 in Campina Grande, Brazil, two days after his 92nd birthday.Políticos lamentam morte de Ivandro Cunha Lima, ex-senador da Paraíba ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Politicians from Paraíba
title: Ivandro Cunha Lima
